title: Modern ceiling fans with integrated light
posting_body: ['Welcome Home to Montane', 'Welcome to Montane Apartments, a place where resort-inspired living and boundless comfort blend together to create an unforgettable experience.', 'Boasting a desirable location and a long list of gorgeous amenities, our apartments in Parker, CO, show you the true meaning of a luxury community.', 'Come visit us and bring your pets along, Schedule a tour of our Parker apartments today!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 2', 'OR Text', '2', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'Use this link for more info:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1083 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Private, spacious patios and decks*', '- Euro-style cabinetry with upgraded hardware and open shelving', '- Large walk-in closets with built-in shelving (featured in select homes)', '- Under-mount kitchen and bathroom sinks', '- Cable/WiFi access and USB charging stations', '- Double sinks and frameless glass showers with subway tiling*', '- Built-in desks and storage*', "- Panoramic views of Mount Evans, Pike's Peak and the Rocky Mountain Front Range", '- Custom gear bench at entry*', '- Modern lighting and designer plumbing fixtures', '- Full-size, front-load Whirlpool washers and dryers in unit', '- Designer kitchens with granite countertops and Whirlpool® stainless steel appliances', '- Rustic hardwood-style plank flooring and Berber-style carpeting', '- Modern ceiling fans with integrated light', '- Open, peninsula or island kitchen options', '*In select units', 'Community Amenities', '- 1.5 miles from Cherry Creek Trail, with direct access to Cherry Creek State Park', '- 10 minutes driving to the Denver Tech Center, 20 minutes to downtown Denver and 30 minutes to DIA', '- Entertaining bar with a kegerator and TVs', '- Pull-in pet, bike and vehicle wash station', '- Community courtyards with gourmet grills and fireside dining', '- Across the street from King Soopers Marketplace, featuring clothing and home goods departments, an expansive prepared foods section and dining area', "- Across the street from Crown Point commercial district, with Costco, Boondock's Family Fun Center, Lifetime Fitness and Children's Learning Adventure", '- Community lounge with WiFi, fireplaces and shuffleboard', '- 1 mile away from Parker Adventist Hospital', '- 7 miles from Reuter-Hess Reservoir, which the town has planned to build out for fishing, hiking and non-motorized boating', '- Community gardens and greenhouse with raised planting beds', '- 1.5-mile, on-site mountain bike and hiking trail that connects to Cherry Creek Trail', '- Outdoor bouldering rock', '- 24-hour, state-of-the-art fitness center and lounge, featuring a dedicated yoga studio, TRX equipment and WELLBEATS Virtual Fitness', '- Resort-style pool, spa and lazy river, with private poolside cabanas, outdoor kitchen and large fire pits', '- 2 miles to the Lightrail station connecting to downtown Denver and Denver International Airport (DIA)', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly, contact for details.', 'Income Requirements:', '3x the rent', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Montane', '18301 East Cottonwood Drive , Parker, CO, 80134', '7tcwsPCVm8']
